summary: This document contains various real estate transaction records related to the sale of a property located at 338 East Washington Road, Bradford, NH. It includes settlement statements, tax declarations, and affidavits signed by Richard Yospin, Trustee of the Richard Yospin Family Trust, and Jeffrey W. Roberts, Manager of Granite Reality LLC. The sale price was recorded as $1,070,750.00.

persons.name: Richard Yospin
persons.context: Richard Yospin is identified as the Trustee of the Richard Yospin Family Trust, involved in the sale of the property.

persons.name: Jeffrey W. Roberts
persons.context: Jeffrey W. Roberts is the Manager of Granite Reality LLC, the buyer in the property transaction.

persons.name: Margaret Weathers
persons.context: Margaret Weathers is mentioned as the Broker Associate from Four Seasons Sotheby's International Realty involved in the sale.

connections.description: Richard Yospin, as the seller, sold the property to Jeffrey W. Roberts, representing Granite Reality LLC.

events.title: Property Sale
events.description: The property located at 338 East Washington Road was sold for $1,070,750.00.

keyFacts: Richard Yospin is the Trustee of the Richard Yospin Family Trust.
Jeffrey W. Roberts is the Manager of Granite Reality LLC.
The transaction included various affidavits and tax declarations.
The closing date of the transaction was December 13, 2019.
